About the Company: Shimoga Technologies Ltd is engaged in manufacturing small, precision and intricate steel forgings.The product range of the company includes Automotive  Rocker Arms, Connecting Rods, Tie Rod Ends, Yokes, Spider, Clutch Hub, Clutch Release Levers.Hydraulic  Valve Bodies, Rod Eye ends, Elbows and Ports.Engineering  Gear Blanks, Wheel dressers, High tensile Insulator Pins, Insulator Hooks.Agricultural Implements  Rotary Tynes (Wet and Dry), Rotovator Shovels, Cultvator Blades. Mining Tools  Coal Augurs, Rotary Drill Bits, Mining Picks.
